title: RPG Music Pack Vol 2
description: A collection of 10 various tracks for RPG, JRPG, adventure, and fantasy games!
longDescription:
Description


Inspired by both classic and modern RPGs, JRPGs, adventure games, platformers and more!

From a composer who's worked on:

Learn Japanese To Survive: Kanji Combat

Primodials: Fireborn

www.tabletopmusic.com

Yandere Simulator


These tracks and others can be previewed here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K0EjzipILKs&index=8&list=PL8Ag5lyEH6XODriflyk0PMeYmd-LwJudt


Feel free to contact me at alecshea@sonancydesigns.com if you have any questions or would like to inquire about original music!
technicalDetails:
Contains 10 loop-able tracks!

1) Adventure, Here I Come!

Description: Adventure, Exploration, Heroic, Inexperienced

2) Colosseum War

Description: Intense, Dramatic, Battle, Epic, Heroic, Climax

3) Evidaan Fields

Description: Calm, Exploration, Relaxing, Peaceful, Fields, Open-World

4) Heaven's Gate War

Description: Triumph, War, Attack, Battle, Large-Scale Combat, King, Command

5) The Colosseum Gates

Description: Epic, Menu, Buildup, Heroic, Triumph, Glory

6) Katokau Village

Description: Peaceful, Relaxing, Charming, Village, Town, River, Stream, Calm

7) Lonely Desert

Description: Middle-Eastern, Desert, Sands, Exploration, Temple

8) War Of The Sky Army

Description: Battle, Heroic, Upbeat, Intense, Dramatic, War, Boss Battle, Sky Battle

9) Yawmouth Tomb

Description: Dungeon, Creepy, Scary, Intense, Horror, Exploring, Evil, Dark, Terrifying, Ambient

10) Soul's Less Tavern

Description: Tavern, Pub, Happy, Light-Hearted, Cheerful, Bard, Hearth, Bright, Easy-Going


Number of music tracks: 10

Does music loop: Yes

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit, Stereo, WAVs

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Minutes of audio provided: 19 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: Any

Supported Target Build Platforms: Any
